function verificationParams(requestInfo) {
    //åœ°å€ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º
    if (!requestInfo.url) {
        throw new Error('è¾“å…¥è¯·æ±‚åœ°å€')
    }

    //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¼‚æ­¥æ˜¯å¦åˆè§„
    if (typeof requestInfo.async !== 'boolean') {
        throw new Error('asyncåªæ¥å—booleanç±»å‹æ•°æ®')
    }

    //è¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼
    if (!(requestInfo.type.toUpperCase() === 'GET' || requestInfo.type.toUpperCase() === 'post')) {
        throw new Error('è¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼æœ‰è¯¯')
    }
}

function ajax(params) {
    //é»˜è®¤å‚æ•°å¯¹è±¡
    let requestInfo={
        type: 'GET',//è¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼
        url:'',
        data:'',//è¯·æ±‚å‚æ•°
        datatype:'string', //æ•°æ®ç±»å‹
        async:true,//å¼‚æ­¥è¿˜æ˜¯åŒæ­¥
        callBack:function(){} //å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°    
    }

    for(let item in params){
        requestInfo[item] = params[item]
    }

    verificationParams(requestInfo)

    const { type, url, data, datatype, async, callBack } = requestInfo

    //æ•°æ®ç±»å‹è½¬æ¢
    let str=''
    let dataType = Object.prototype.toString.call(data)
    if (dataType==='[object String]'){
        str = data.replace(/,/g,'&')
    } else if (dataType==='[object Object]'){
        for(let attr in data){
            str+=attr+'='+data[attr]+'&'
        }
        str=str.slice(0,-1)
    }

    let xhr = new XMLHttpRequest()

    if(type.toUpperCase()==='GET'){
        xhr.open(type.toUpperCase(),url+'?'+str,async)
        xhr.send()
    }else{
        xhr.open(type.toUpperCase(),url,async)
        xhr.setRequestHeader('content-type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded')
        xhr.send(str)
    }
    xhr.onload=function(){
        if(datatype==='json'){
            callBack(eval('('+xhr.responseText+')'))
        }else{
            callBack(xhr.responseText)
        }
    }
}

function Ajax(params){
    let promise=new Promise(function(resolve,reject){
        ajax({
            url:params.url,
            type:params.type.toUpperCase() || 'GET',
            data:params.data ||'',
            datatype:params.datatype || 'string',
            async:params.async || true,
            callBack:function(res){
                resolve(res)
            }
        })
    })
    return promise
}

export default function ajax(url='',params={},type='GET'){
  let promise;
  type = type.toUpperCase()
  return new Promise(((resolve, reject) => {
    //1.åˆ¤æ–­è¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼
    if (type==='GET'){

          str+=value+'='+params[value]+'&';

      //1.2å®Œæ•´è·¯å¾„
      url+='?'+str;

      promise = axios.post(url,params);
    }
    //2.è¿”å›è¯·æ±‚ç»“æœ

      resolve(response.data);

}

import * as React from "react"

import * as XLSX from "xlsx"

import { Button, Icon } from "antd"

export interface ExportExcelProps {
  notice: string;
  fileName: string;
  headers: string[] | Function; //è¡¨å¤´
  getExportData: Function;
}

export class ExportExcel extends React.Component<ExportExcelProps, any> {
  handleExport = async () => {
    const { headers, fileName } = this.props
    //è¿™é‡Œæ˜¯è·å–å¯¼å‡ºæ•°æ®çš„å‡½æ•°
    const exportData = await this.props.getExportData()

    this.exportExcel(headers, exportData, fileName)
  }

  exportExcel(headers, data, fileName) {
    const _headers = headers
      .map((item, i) =>
        Object.assign(
          {},
          {
            key: item.key,
            title: item.title,
            position: String.fromCharCode(65 + i) + 1,
          }
        )
      )
      .reduce(
        (prev, next) =>
          Object.assign({}, prev, {
            [next.position]: { key: next.key, v: next.title },
          }),
        {}
      )

    const _data = data
      .map((item, i) =>
        headers.map((key, j) =>
          Object.assign(
            {},
            {
              content: item[key.key],
              position: String.fromCharCode(65 + j) + (i + 2),
            }
          )
        )
      )
      // å¯¹åˆšæ‰çš„ç»“æœè¿›è¡Œé™ç»´å¤„ç†ï¼ˆäºŒç»´æ•°ç»„å˜æˆä¸€ç»´æ•°ç»„ï¼‰
      .reduce((prev, next) => prev.concat(next))
      // è½¬æ¢æˆ worksheet éœ€è¦çš„ç»“æ„
      .reduce(
        (prev, next) =>
          Object.assign({}, prev, { [next.position]: { v: next.content } }),
        {}
      )

    // åˆå¹¶ headers å’Œ data
    const output = Object.assign({}, _headers, _data)
    // è·å–æ‰€æœ‰å•å…ƒæ ¼çš„ä½ç½®
    const outputPos = Object.keys(output)
    // è®¡ç®—å‡ºèŒƒå›´ ,["A1",..., "H2"]
    const ref = `${outputPos[0]}:${outputPos[outputPos.length - 1]}`

    // æ„å»º workbook å¯¹è±¡
    const wb = {
      SheetNames: ["mySheet"],
      Sheets: {
        mySheet: Object.assign(
          {},
          output, //åˆ—å®½
          {
            "!ref": ref,
            "!cols": [
              { wpx: 150 },
              { wpx: 150 },
              { wpx: 150 },
              { wpx: 150 },
              { wpx: 150 },
              { wpx: 150 },
              { wpx: 150 },
              { wpx: 150 },
            ],
          }
        ),
      },
    }
    // å¯¼å‡º Excel
    XLSX.writeFile(wb, `${fileName}.xlsx`)
  }
  render() {
    const { notice } = this.props
    return (
      <Button type="primary" onClick={() => this.handleExport()}>
        {notice}
        <Icon type="download" />
      </Button>
    )
  }
}

export class ImportExcel extends React.Component<ImportExcelProps, any> {

    importExcel = file => {
        // è·å–ä¸Šä¼ çš„æ–‡ä»¶å¯¹è±¡
        const { files } = file.target;
        // é€šè¿‡FileReaderå¯¹è±¡è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶
        const fileReader = new FileReader();
        fileReader.onload = event => {
            try {
                const { result } = event.target;
                // ä»¥äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æµæ–¹å¼è¯»å–å¾—åˆ°æ•´ä»½excelè¡¨æ ¼å¯¹è±¡
                const workbook = XLSX.read(result, { type: 'binary' });
                let data = []; // å­˜å‚¨è·å–åˆ°çš„æ•°æ®
                // éå†æ¯å¼ å·¥ä½œè¡¨è¿›è¡Œè¯»å–ï¼ˆè¿™é‡Œé»˜è®¤åªè¯»å–ç¬¬ä¸€å¼ è¡¨ï¼‰
                for (const sheet in workbook.Sheets) {
                    if (workbook.Sheets.hasOwnProperty(sheet)) {
                        // åˆ©ç”¨ sheet_to_json æ–¹æ³•å°† excel è½¬æˆ json æ•°æ®
                        data = data.concat(XLSX.utils.sheet_to_json(workbook.Sheets[sheet]));
                        break; // å¦‚æœåªå–ç¬¬ä¸€å¼ è¡¨ï¼Œå°±å–æ¶ˆæ³¨é‡Šè¿™è¡Œ
                    }
                }
                //è¿™é‡Œè·å–è§£æå¥½çš„excelå†…å®¹
                this.props.getFileInfo(data)
            } catch (e) {
                // è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥æŠ›å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹é”™è¯¯ä¸æ­£ç¡®çš„ç›¸å…³æç¤º
                message.warning('error')
            }
        };
        // ä»¥äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–¹å¼æ‰“å¼€æ–‡ä»¶
        files.length > 0 && fileReader.readAsBinaryString(files[0]);
    }

    render() {
        const { notice } = this.props
        return (
            <Button type="primary" style={{ position: 'relative' }}>
                <input type='file' accept='.xlsx, .xls' onChange={e => this.importExcel(e)} className="uploadBtn" />{notice || 'å¯¼å…¥Excel'}
                < Icon type="upload" />
            </Button>
        );
    }
}

import 'braft-editor/dist/index.css';

import { UploadFn } from './UploadFn';

export class RichText extends Component {
    constructor() {
        super();
        this.state = {
            editorState: BraftEditor.createEditorState(null),
        };
        RichText.submitContent = this.submitContent.bind(this);
    }

    async componentDidMount() {
        // å‡è®¾æ­¤å¤„ä»æœåŠ¡ç«¯è·å–htmlæ ¼å¼çš„ç¼–è¾‘å™¨å†…å®¹
        let htmlContent = this.props.htmlContent || null;
        // ä½¿ç”¨BraftEditor.createEditorStateå°†htmlå­—ç¬¦ä¸²è½¬æ¢ä¸ºç¼–è¾‘å™¨éœ€è¦çš„editorStat
        this.setState({
            editorState: BraftEditor.createEditorState(htmlContent),
        });
    }

    componentWillReceiveProps(nextProps) {
        if (nextProps.htmlContent !== this.state.htmlContent) {
            this.setState({
                editorState: BraftEditor.createEditorState(nextProps.htmlContent),
            });
        }
    }

    submitContent = async () => {
        // åœ¨ç¼–è¾‘å™¨è·å¾—ç„¦ç‚¹æ—¶æŒ‰ä¸‹ctrl+sä¼šæ‰§è¡Œæ­¤æ–¹æ³•
        // ç¼–è¾‘å™¨å†…å®¹æäº¤åˆ°æœåŠ¡ç«¯ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œå¯ç›´æ¥è°ƒç”¨editorState.toHTML()æ¥è·å–HTMLæ ¼å¼çš„å†…å®¹
        const htmlContent = this.state.editorState.toHTML();
        return htmlContent;
    };

    handleEditorChange = editorState => {
        this.setState({ editorState });
    };

    render() {
        return (
            <BraftEditor
                value={this.state.editorState}
                onChange={this.handleEditorChange}
                onSave={this.submitContent}
                onBlur={() => {
                    const htmlContent = this.state.editorState.toHTML();
                }}
                // excludeControls={['options']}
                media={{ uploadFn: UploadFn }}
            />
        );
    }
}

03ã€Gulp Demoï¼Ÿ

const gulp = require('gulp');
const del = require('del');
const zip = require('gulp-zip');
const merge = require('merge2');
const appName = require('./package.json').name;
const appVersion = require('./package.json').version;

gulp.task('copy-public', function () {
    return gulp.src('./public/**').pipe(gulp.dest('./build/static'));
});

gulp.task('clear-prebuild', function () {
    return del([
        './build/server/**',
        './build/static/**',
        './build/archive/**',
        './build/*.zip',
    ]);
});

gulp.task('move', function () {
    // const buildId = fs.readFileSync('build/BUILD_ID', 'utf8');
    const archiveNodePath = 'build/archive/nodejs';
    const archiveCDNPath = 'build/archive/cdn';
    return merge(
        // CDN
        gulp
            .src(['./build/static/**', '!./build/static/**/*.map'])
            .pipe(gulp.dest(`${archiveCDNPath}/_next/static/`)),
        gulp.src(['./public/**']).pipe(gulp.dest(`${archiveCDNPath}/`)),
        // Node
        gulp.src(['.npmrc']).pipe(gulp.dest(`${archiveNodePath}`)),
        gulp
            .src([
                './**',
                '!./node_modules{,/**}',
                '!./build/static/**',
                '!./build/cache/**',
                '!./build/archive/**',
                '!logs{,/**}',
                '!docs{,/**}',
                '!sourcemaps{,/**}',
                '!config{,/**}',
                '!gulpfile.js',
                '!external{,/**}',
                '!*.lock',
                '!README.md',
                '!CHANGELOG.md',
            ])
            .pipe(gulp.dest(`${archiveNodePath}`))
    );
});

gulp.task('zip:cdn', function () {
    return gulp
        .src('build/archive/cdn/**', { base: './build/archive/cdn', dot: true })
        .pipe(zip(`${appName}-archive-cdn.zip`))
        .pipe(gulp.dest('./build/archive'));
});

gulp.task('zip:nodejs', function () {
    return gulp
        .src('build/archive/nodejs/**', {
            base: './build/archive/nodejs',
            dot: true,
        })
        .pipe(zip(`${appName}-archive-nodejs.zip`))
        .pipe(gulp.dest('./build/archive'));
});

gulp.task('ci', gulp.series(['copy-public', 'move', 'zip:cdn', 'zip:nodejs']));
